title: Expand critique-waves.md to Progressive Disclosure Structure
description: Convert the single-file critique-waves.md skill into a directory-based skill with SKILL.md router, workflows, and scripts, following the github skill pattern.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Create skills/critique-waves/ directory structure mirroring github skill pattern
Create SKILL.md with: YAML frontmatter, overview, quick actions table, and links to workflows
Create workflows/setup.md covering: verification folder creation, instructions.md template, tracker.md initialization
Create workflows/run-wave.md covering: launching agents in parallel, collecting results, updating tracker
Create workflows/iteration.md covering: handling failures, resetting counters, continuing until consensus goal
Create scripts/init-tracker.sh that initializes the verification folder structure with proper templates
Remove old critique-waves.md single file after directory structure is complete
Update symlink at ~/.claude/commands/critique-waves to point to new directory
